botcomponent.description:
This knowledge source contains folders and files that represent queries. # Instructions for agent - Only use files within the Dataverse folder. - Search only files that end with the file extension ".kql". - Use the description of each ".kql" file to determine if you should run the query.
# Output - You need to use the Kusto Query Language query and reformat based on user input.
botcomponent.name: Azure Monitor Community
